creator_info.about_en: Geert Verheyden, MD, is a professor of rehabilitation sciences at Katholieke Universiteit in Leuven, Belgium. He is also the secretary of POC Rehabilitation Sciences and Physiotherapy and is published in multiple academic journals. Dr. Verheyden's research interests include sensory and motor status, and noninvasive brain stimulation of patients who have suffered from a stroke.
